nodes.text: A holotable (also spelled holo-table) was a piece of furniture that projected holograms above its surface. The military used them for battle analysis, and civilians could use them to establish communication with other beings, or watch sporting events.
Holotables feature prominently in the canon 2015 mobile game, Star Wars: Galaxy of Heroes, where they are used by the player to wage battles with a plethora of Star Wars characters.
